Author: Group From The Society Of Graduates Of Thai Universities And Institutes

læa rea di hı sayyan tang«khxng rea kæ phwk khea læw phwk khea k phinhlanghı man

chanan sing thi phwk khea kratha xea wi mi hı prayochn kæ phwk khea di ley

læa rea midi srang chan fa thanghlay læa phændin læa sing thi xyu rahwang thang sxng nan pheux xun dı wentæ pen khwam cring læa thæ cring wan ki ya mahˌ ca mi ma xyang nænxn dangnan cea cng xphay dwy kar xphay thi di
thæcring phracea khxng cea (muhammad) phuthrng srang phuthrng rxbru
læa doy nænxn rea di hı kæ cea ced xa yahˌ thi thuk xan sa læa xal ku rxa nthi ying hıy
xya thxdsayta thang sxng khxng cea pi yang chnchan tang«khxng phwk khea læa xya seiycı thæn phwk khea læa cng ld pik khxng cea hı ta tx brrda phu sraththa
læa (muhammad) cng klaw theid thæcring chan pen phu takteuxn xyang chad cæng
chen deiyw kab thi rea di hı kæ phwk bæng kar sraththa

dangnan khx saban dwy phracea khxng cea nænxn rea ca tham phwk khea thanghmd
thungthi phwk khea di kratha wi
dangnan cng prakas xyang peidphey nı sing thi cea thuk baycha læa cng phinhlanghı phwk mu chrikin
